data.name: 0000 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With things arranged as such, I ended up going out shopping with Asahina.

data.name: 0001 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess it's a breath of fresh air amidst the messy and complicated summer camp.

data.name: 0002 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Umm, what sort of things are best for a barbecue?

data.name: 0003 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's see... Isn't anything fine as long as you can cook it?

data.name: 0004 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Hmm, I wonder what we should go for…

data.name: 0005 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina appeared to be considering all sorts of things as we walked.

data.name: 0006 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe it'd be best to make a suggestion.

data.name: 0007 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How about corn on the cob, considering it's a staple?

data.name: 0008 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, Kyon, that sounds delicious!

data.name: 0009 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: That sort of more substantial vegetable is probably a good idea as well.

data.name: 0010 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I wonder what else…

data.name: 0011 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina was thinking of what to buy next after corn.

data.name: 0012 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I'll write a note of the “#P05recipe#P00.”

data.name: 0013 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina's “#P05recipe#P01,” huh.

data.name: 0014 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I get the feeling that's gonna come in handy.

data.name: 0016 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What about roasted rice cakes?

data.name: 0017 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ahaha, silly Kyon.

data.name: 0018 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Not even a dog would eat that.

data.name: 0019 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina seemed to find my joke funny, but…

data.name: 0020 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina, wasn't it a marital quarrel that dogs won't eat?

data.name: 0021 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh? Wh-what? Was I wrong? Th-that's embarrassing…

data.name: 0022 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Seeing Asahina looking embarrassed is more wonderful than any kind of "#P05retort#P01."

data.name: 0023 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess this is that element of moe that Haruhi said about.

data.name: 0025 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: While the two of us were walking, we arrived at a greengrocer.

data.name: 0026 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: Welcome!

data.name: 0027 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Excuse us, do you mind if we look around?

data.name: 0028 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: Go ahead!

data.name: 0029 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The old man running the store replied with an excessive amount of energy.

data.name: 0032 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm not sure if it was funny or cute how taken aback Asahina was.

data.name: 0034 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: You two are students from North High, right?

data.name: 0035 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-yes.

data.name: 0036 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: You're on summer holiday right now, aren't you?

data.name: 0037 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Yes, we are.

data.name: 0038 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: Is there some event on at the school, since you're shopping in uniform during the holiday?

data.name: 0039 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Oh, it's to do with our club activities…

data.name: 0040 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The old man was only talking to Asahina, but frankly I can understand that.

data.name: 0041 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He must've spent all day with women long past their prime.

data.name: 0042 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can't blame him for being excited, having an angel arrive in his cabbage patch.

data.name: 0044 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: You there, young boy--are you on carrying duty?

data.name: 0045 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Well, something like that.

data.name: 0046 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I thought he was talking to me all of a sud- den, but I guess it's just out of obligation?

data.name: 0048 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Kyon, are we okay with just corn and cabbage?

data.name: 0049 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I think it'd look good if we had onions and peppers as well.

data.name: 0050 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I see... So appearance is important as well.

data.name: 0051 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's probably best to have some appetizing colors, like some red things perhaps.

data.name: 0052 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: What about tomatoes?

data.name: 0053 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I get the feeling tomatoes would end up quite flabby if we cook them though…

data.name: 0054 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Lightly roasted tomatoes are actually delicious.

data.name: 0055 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If Asahina says so I'm sure she's right. I'd definitely love to try that.

data.name: 0056 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Then, this and this… Let's also get this before we head out.

data.name: 0057 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Are you sure we can buy that much?

data.name: 0058 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Yes, I'm keeping track of the price.

data.name: 0059 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't know where it came from, but Asahina was working out the prices with a calculator.

data.name: 0060 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm sure her phone has a calculator, but ha- ving a cute pocket calculator is very Asahina.

data.name: 0061 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: H-huh? Where could it have gone...?

data.name: 0062 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What happened, Asahina?

data.name: 0063 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-um, well... I don't have the purse holding the money I was given.

data.name: 0064 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh--?!

data.name: 0065 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I wonder if I dropped it somewhere…

data.name: 0066 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina's eyes filled with tears at once as she began to panic.

data.name: 0067 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wh-what should we do?

data.name: 0068 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: This is bad...

data.name: 0069 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When I began to panic with her, I noticed a dropped receipt by her feet.

data.name: 0070 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …What on earth is this expensive payment on this receipt?

data.name: 0071 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Looking closer, the receipt was incredibly long and had the name of this shop on it.

data.name: 0072 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The total price is... six figures?

data.name: 0073 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Spending more than 100,000 shopping at a greengrocer is quite a shock.

data.name: 0074 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm sure Haruhi would be interested by this.

data.name: 0075 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I picked up the “#P05expensive receipt#P01” and put it away in my pocket.

data.name: 0076 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina, try to calm down for a bit. There's no point panicking.

data.name: 0077 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: R-right. I'm sorry Kyon, please take this.

data.name: 0078 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina handed over a “#P05calculator#P01” the size of a keyring.

data.name: 0079 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess I'll look after this for now. I'll give it back when she's calmed down.

data.name: 0080 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It's not here… It's not here…

data.name: 0081 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I was surprised a girl's uniform even had that many places to keep a purse.

data.name: 0082 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Could you have dropped it somewhere?

data.name: 0083 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I might have…

data.name: 0084 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina was teary-eyed, staring at the ground.

data.name: 0085 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If you stare at it like that, I think even the ground must feel at a loss for what to do.

data.name: 0086 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeek… What should we do, Kyon...?

data.name: 0087 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I wish I could say I have enough to cover it myself, but unfortunately I'm not so sure.

data.name: 0088 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I was really pleased Suzumiya wanted to have a barbecue, and now this…

data.name: 0089 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I thought we could stay out of any danger, if only for a little while…

data.name: 0090 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina was past the point of teary-eyed and was on the verge of bursting into tears.

data.name: 0091 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It was hard for me to watch her.

data.name: 0092 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I really want to help, so I feel pathetic not happening to have anything on hand.

data.name: 0093 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: My current wallet situation means we'd have to miss out on either meat or vegetables.

data.name: 0094 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, this doesn't necessarily mean we're at a complete loss yet.

data.name: 0095 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: B-but…

data.name: 0096 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There must be a way. Let's not give up just yet and see what we can do, Asahina.

data.name: 0097 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-okay... I'll try my best.

data.name: 0098 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just hearing those words of “#P05perseverance#P01” from Asahina is a relief.

data.name: 0099 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Why don't you check one more time?

data.name: 0100 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-okayy…

data.name: 0101 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As she searched through her pockets, she seemed to find a small bell.

data.name: 0102 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's that?

data.name: 0103 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It seems to be some kind of bell.

data.name: 0104 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Maybe it was attached to the purse?

data.name: 0105 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I'm not sure, but... it's not mine.

data.name: 0106 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I took the "#P05bell#P01" from Asahina.

data.name: 0107 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I wonder when this got lost in Asahina's pocket?

data.name: 0109 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: What's wrong? Don't have your wallet?

data.name: 0110 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Kinda, yeah…

data.name: 0111 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'd rather they didn't call us while we're trying to deal with this, but I guess that's business.

data.name: 0113 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: If the barbecue is cancelled because I lost the money, it's all my fault.

data.name: 0114 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: J-just try to calm down if you can.

data.name: 0115 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I really want to avoid her breaking into genuine crying here.

data.name: 0116 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm gonna need to somehow keep Asahina calm and find us some money.

data.name: 0117 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We might not have a choice but to go back and ask Koizumi for help.

data.name: 0118 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I'm sorry, Kyon…

data.name: 0119 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If we happen to find the wallet on the way back, that would be lucky.

data.name: 0121 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: I said--do you not have your wallet?

data.name: 0122 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Sorry, it looks like we dropped it...

data.name: 0123 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: I don't mind if you pay later then.

data.name: 0124 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh?

data.name: 0125 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: Out of respect for that cute young lady I'll let you pay later.

data.name: 0126 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wh-whaaa...?

data.name: 0127 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: Since I know you're students from North High, and either way--you're cute, young miss.

data.name: 0128 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The line behind was in fervent agreement.

data.name: 0129 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: So you can pay later. Drop by on your way home or something, and I'll let you pay then.

data.name: 0130 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh, but... is that really okay?

data.name: 0131 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: It's absolutely okay. You're using it for your club activities, so go take it.

data.name: 0132 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina had drawn out the shopkeeper's kindness just by being a cute girl.

data.name: 0133 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She politely took the vegetables from the greengrocer's shopkeeper.

data.name: 0134 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Thank you very much. We'll be sure to pay you back later.

data.name: 0135 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: If it looks like you'll be heading home late, you can even do it tomorrow, young miss.

data.name: 0136 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Are you sure that's okay?

data.name: 0137 (426.ja) GROCER (八百屋)
data.value: Yes, absolutely! You're not the type to take advantage of me, right, young miss?

data.name: 0138 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: They very much agreed to that as well.

data.name: 0139 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina, if we can pay later, I think we should be able to sort something out.

data.name: 0140 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: R-really…?

data.name: 0141 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So let's calm down, accept these groceries and head back.

data.name: 0142 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-okay.

data.name: 0143 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Thank you very much. We promise we'll bring you the money later.

data.name: 0144 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I said my goodbyes along with Asahina, who was repeatedly bowing her head.

data.name: 0147 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: At the very least, we've got what we need. Now we just have to figure out funding this.

data.name: 0148 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We've at least managed to get vegetables. I can cover the cost for the meat myself.

data.name: 0149 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So let's head back to school.

data.name: 0150 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Okay, Kyon.

data.name: 0152 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We carefully searched the route we came while we walked, but never came across the wallet.

data.name: 0154 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Perhaps feeling responsible for losing it, Asahina was teary-eyed the whole way back.

data.name: 0156 (426.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're way too late, Kyon!

data.name: 0157 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Thanks to being back so late, our lord brigade chief was in an utterly foul mood.

data.name: 0158 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Sorry, we have our reasons.

data.name: 0159 (426.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What was it? By reasons, do you mean this?

data.name: 0161 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Th-that's...!

data.name: 0162 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi was holding the wallet we thought we'd lost.

data.name: 0163 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How about you explain why you have the wallet...

data.name: 0164 (426.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You explain how you managed to get the shopping when you forgot the wallet.

data.name: 0165 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What on earth did our Brigade Chief just say?

data.name: 0166 (426.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru forgot the wallet, you know.

data.name: 0167 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Whaaa...?

data.name: 0168 (426.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon, did you really have enough money to cover the costs yourself?

data.name: 0169 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, the old man running the grocery actually said he'll put it on our tab...

data.name: 0170 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...since Asahina is cute.

data.name: 0171 (426.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What sort of joke is that?

data.name: 0172 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm not joking, I'm serious.

data.name: 0173 (426.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Seriously?

data.name: 0174 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Very serious.

data.name: 0175 (426.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Is that right, Mikuru?

data.name: 0176 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-yes. He told us it's fine, we can bring him the money another time.

data.name: 0177 (426.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Great job, Mikuru! You're brilliant!

data.name: 0178 (426.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wh-why is that?

data.name: 0179 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can't quite accept that she's being praised for forgetting the wallet...

data.name: 0180 (426.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This is a victory for Mikuru's cuteness!

data.name: 0181 (426.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Shouldn't expect anything less of a brigade member I scouted myself!

data.name: 0182 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I see, so that's what she was praising, huh...

data.name: 0183 (426.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That grocery's owner has great taste.

data.name: 0184 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi was in extremely high spirits.

data.name: 0185 (426.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We went through a lot of troubles, but this is certainly better than her being in a bad mood.

data.name: 0186 (426.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well then, you can go pay them later, Kyon.

data.name: 0187 (426.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah yeah... Whatever you say...

data.name: 0188 (426.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Corn

data.name: 0189 (426.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Roasted rice cakes

data.name: 0190 (426.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Panic together

data.name: 0191 (426.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Calm down

data.name: 0192 (426.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Encourage

data.name: 0193 (426.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Check again
